channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Big Picture: These Eagles' Super Bowl Hopes Rest on Their Defense
item.description: The Eagles' offense is struggling heading into the playoffs. Is their great defense good enough to lead them to another title?

item.title: 2026 NFL Draft Order After Sunday's Week 17 games
item.description: Who is in line to get the No. 1 pick in the 2026 NFL Draft? Here's the latest projected draft order.

item.title: Monday Morning NFL Top 10 Rankings: Seahawks Hold Top Spot; Eagles Rejoin; Bills Fall
item.description: With one week left in the regular season, the top teams are cementing their spots while the defending champs resurface among the elite.

item.title: Philip Rivers Happy He Got 3 'Bonus Games' Even if His Colts Return is Over
item.description: Philip Rivers knows he may have made the last start of his improbable comeback, and he said he would've signed up to do it all again even after knowin...

item.title: Eagles Coach Nick Sirianni Responds to Bills Fans Following Dramatic Victory
item.description: Nick Sirianni made some comments as he walked back to the locker room following the Eagles' 13-12 win over the Bills on Sunday.

item.title: Grading coaching hires: Whittingham, Michigan agree to deal
item.description: As the coaching carousel continues to spin, we grade every major hire.

item.title: Kawhi puts up career-high 55 for streaking Clips
item.description: Kawhi Leonard scored a career-high 55 points as the Clippers extended their winning streak with a victory over the Eastern Conference-leading Pistons.

item.title: Ravens-Steelers on SNF to cap Week 18 slate

item.title: Purdy 'playing as good as it gets'; 49ers eye 1-seed
item.description: For the second week in a row, QB Brock Purdy accounted for five touchdowns as the 49ers outlasted the Bears 42-38 in a wild shootout on "Sunday Night ...

item.title: Ex-boxing champ Joshua injured in fatal crash
item.description: Anthony Joshua suffered minor injuries Monday in a car crash in Nigeria that killed two others.
